moulberrystweaks.option.fast_loading_ove: Speeds up the resource loading overlay by removing the fade out animation
moulberrystweaks.option.transparent_load: Removes the background from the resource loading overlay
moulberrystweaks.option.automatic_pack_r: Automatically reloads resourcepacks when a file in the folder is changed
moulberrystweaks.option.correct_attack_i: The attack indicator bar is inaccurate. It resets server-side whenever you swing your arms, but will still show a full bar on the client. This feature makes the attack indicator visually show the true value
moulberrystweaks.option.log_packet_excep: Prints the stacktrace of a packet exception, useful for debugging
moulberrystweaks.option.ignore_narrator_: If the narrator can't be loaded, stop the game from complaining about it
moulberrystweaks.option.enable_component: Enables a keybind (K) to open a widget showing item component data. Requires a restart.
moulberrystweaks.option.enable_packet_de: Enables a keybind (J) to open a widget showing incoming and outgoing inventory packets. Useful for server developers. Requires a restart.
moulberrystweaks.option.confirm_disconne: Adds a confirmation when disconnecting from a server to avoid accidental disconnects
